ca.corefacility.gview.managers

Class SectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.managers.SectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GViewEventListener, GViewEventSubject, java.util.EventListener

    public class SectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements GViewEventListener, GViewEventSubject
    Divide map up into sections, and manage/display each section individually.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau

        public java.util.List<SectionID> toSectionRange(BaseRange baseRange)
        Converts the passed base range to a section range.
        Parameters:
        baseRange - The base range to convert.
        Returns:
        A list of section ids which intersect the passed base range, or null if base range is null.
